attributes.action: Implement speed bumps or speed cameras along Willows Lane, Accrington, BB5
attributes.additional_details:
For the safety of local residents.
There have been numerous accidents involving cars, pedestrians and animals throughout recent years and people speed up and down this road on a daily basis; particularly at night.

This tends to be an issue from the roundabout adjacent to Richmond Road and the roundabout adjacent to Ormerod Street/Bullough Park
attributes.background: Tougher speeder restrictions in this area

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
